import React, { useEffect } from "react"; import { Button, Container } from "semantic-ui-react"; import { fetchCart } from "../redux/action/cart"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { connect } from "react-redux"; import { getImage } from "../utils"; const Checkout = ({ fetchCart, cart }) => { useEffect(() => { fetchCart(); }, []); let cartItems = cart?.order_items; document.title = `Checkout ( ${cart?.order_items.length} items ) | Luxury Silk Online`; return ( <>
